original_text: So think about how great this man, Melchizedek, was! Even Abraham, the ancestor of all Israel's people, gave gifts to Melchizedek. Abraham gave him a tenth part of everything that he had won in the fight.
korean_text: 이 사람이 얼마나 높은가를 생각해 보라 조상 아브라함도 노략물 중 십분의 일을 그에게 주었느니라

sentences.original_text: So think about how great this man, Melchizedek, was!
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 이 멜기세덕이라는 사람이 얼마나 위대한지 생각해 보십시오!

sentences.original_text: Even Abraham, the ancestor of all Israel's people,
Abraham gave him a tenth part of everything
sentences.korean_translation: 아브라함은 그에게 모든 것의 십일조를 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: that he had won in the fight.
sentences.korean_translation: 전투에서 얻은 모든 것의 십일조를 주었습니다.
